style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;arcSize=3;fillColor=none;glass=0;perimeterSpacing=0;labelBorderColor=none;shadowOffsetX=2;shadowOpacity=80;shadowColor=#33FFFF;strokeColor=#D4E1F5;strokeWidth=1;shadowBlur=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="336" y="40" width="803" height="604.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="xoSKbmUR9g-QrYVp5UOQ-9" value="REPO" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;shadow=1;sketch=0;shadowColor=#33FFFF;textShadow=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;shadowOpacity=80;fontSize=17;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="15" y="26" width="110" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-1" value="JOB" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;shadow=1;sketch=0;shadowColor=#33FFFF;textShadow=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;shadowOpacity=80;fontSize=17;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="174" y="32" width="110" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-5" value="FLOW" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;shadow=1;sketch=0;shadowColor=#33FFFF;textShadow=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;shadowOpacity=80;fontSize=17;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="336" y="40" width="110" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-44" value="<p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">Job repository registers all available jobs. It is also responsible for persisting the state of job executions and step executions.</span><br></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px;"><br></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px;">Repo could be exposed externally for execution and monitoring.</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="82" width="147" height="139" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-46" value="<p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px;">A Job represents the entire batch process. It consists of multiple steps and defines the sequence in which those steps should be executed.</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px;"><br></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px;">Job Execution State is persisted.&nbsp;</p><div><br></div>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="180" y="90" width="147" height="152" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-47" value="<p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px;">A Flow is a sequence of steps or transitions within a job. It can be used to model complex job flows, including conditional transitions, splits, and joins.</p><div><br></div>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="346" y="98" width="147" height="152" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-50" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;arcSize=8;fillColor=none;glass=0;perimeterSpacing=0;labelBorderColor=none;shadowOffsetX=2;shadowOpacity=80;shadowColor=#33FFFF;strokeColor=#D4E1F5;strokeWidth=1;shadowBlur=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="503" width="148" height="145" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-52" value="<h3 style="margin-top: 0px;">JobLauncher</h3><p>Initiates the execution of a job and passes necessary parameters.</p><p>Job could be launched in a separate thread.</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="25.5" y="503" width="139" height="131" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-53" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;arcSize=10;fillColor=none;glass=0;perimeterSpacing=0;labelBorderColor=none;shadowOffsetX=2;shadowOpacity=80;shadowColor=#33FFFF;strokeColor=#D4E1F5;strokeWidth=1;shadowBlur=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="400" width="148" height="93" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-54" value="<h3 style="margin-top: 0px;">Application Scope</h3><p>Singleton scope of a standard Spring application.<br></p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="25.5" y="405" width="139" height="86" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-59" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;arcSize=8;fillColor=none;glass=0;perimeterSpacing=0;labelBorderColor=none;shadowOffsetX=2;shadowOpacity=80;shadowColor=#33FFFF;strokeColor=#D4E1F5;strokeWidth=1;shadowBlur=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="179.5" y="384" width="148" height="135" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-60" value="<h3 style="margin-top: 0px;">Job Scope</h3><p>All beans inside job&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">All beans within the Job Scope are initialized at the start of the job and destroyed upon its completion.</span><br></p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="185" y="389" width="139" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-62" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;arcSize=8;fillColor=none;glass=0;perimeterSpacing=0;labelBorderColor=none;shadowOffsetX=2;shadowOpacity=80;shadowColor=#33FFFF;strokeColor=#D4E1F5;strokeWidth=1;shadowBlur=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="179" y="526" width="148" height="118" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-63" value="<h3 style="margin-top: 0px;">Job Listener</h3><p>Execute custom logic before and after a job runs<br></p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="185" y="528" width="139" height="105" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-64" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;arcSize=8;fillColor=none;glass=0;perimeterSpacing=0;labelBorderColor=none;shadowOffsetX=2;shadowOpacity=80;shadowColor=#33FFFF;strokeColor=#D4E1F5;strokeWidth=1;shadowBlur=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="346" y="464.5" width="148" height="168.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-65" value="<h3 style="margin-top: 0px;">Flow Builder</h3><p>Start, Split, Join and decide on a condition.</p><p>Flow is a decision controller that determines the next step to execute based on the result of the previous step.&nbsp;</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="351.5" y="469.5" width="139" height="158.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-153" value="" margin-bottom: 0px;">Tasklet step is the asiest way to implement a simple batch job.</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=0;" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;arcSize=10;fillColor=none;glass=0;perimeterSpacing=0;labelBorderColor=none;shadowOffsetX=2;shadowOpacity=80;shadowColor=#33FFFF;strokeColor=#D4E1F5;strokeWidth=1;shadowBlur=1;" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;shadow=1;sketch=0;shadowColor=#33FFFF;textShadow=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;shadowOpacity=80;fontSize=17;" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;arcSize=10;fillColor=none;glass=0;perimeterSpacing=0;labelBorderColor=none;shadowOffsetX=2;shadowOpacity=80;shadowColor=#33FFFF;strokeColor=#D4E1F5;strokeWidth=1;shadowBlur=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="782" y="564" width="151" height="48" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-43" value="WRITER" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;shadow=1;sketch=0;shadowColor=#33FFFF;textShadow=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;shadowOpacity=80;fontSize=17;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="802" y="563" width="110" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-49" value="<p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px;">Divides data into smaller chunks for parallel processing. It improves the performance by processing partitions concurrently.</p><div><br></div>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="654" y="404" width="117" height="152" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-66" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;arcSize=8;fillColor=none;glass=0;perimeterSpacing=0;labelBorderColor=none;shadowOffsetX=2;shadowOpacity=80;shadowColor=#33FFFF;strokeColor=#D4E1F5;strokeWidth=1;shadowBlur=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="662" y="210" width="126" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-67" value="<h3 style="margin-top: 0px;">Step Scope</h3>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="666" y="214" width="113" height="32" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-72" value="<h3 style="margin-top: 0px;">Step Listener</h3>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="525.75" y="214" width="113" height="32" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-73" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;arcSize=8;fillColor=none;glass=0;perimeterSpacing=0;labelBorderColor=none;shadowOffsetX=2;shadowOpacity=80;shadowColor=#33FFFF;strokeColor=#D4E1F5;strokeWidth=1;shadowBlur=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="523" y="210" width="126" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-48" value="<p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px;">A Step is a single phase of a job. It defines the actual work to be done, including partitioning, reading, processing, and writing data.</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">Step could be Chunk that include Reader, Processor and Writer or Tasklet that is intended to execute some small scenario.</span><br></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><br></span></p><div>This is not partitioned or&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">single chunk</span><span style="background-color: initial;">&nbsp;step.</span></div>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="522" y="94" width="411" height="112" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YP2LvssRMxXgJCmg1-2v-181" value="STEP" p.span: Job repository registers all available jobs. It is also responsible for persisting the state of job executions and step executions.

div.p: Repo could be exposed externally for execution and monitoring.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 149px; height: 1px; padding-top: 73px; margin-left: 169px;

div.p: A Job represents the entire batch process. It consists of multiple steps and defines the sequence in which those steps should be executed.

div.p: A Flow is a sequence of steps or transitions within a job. It can be used to model complex job flows, including conditional transitions, splits, and joins.

Job could be launched in a separate thread.

div.p: Start, Split, Join and decide on a condition.
Flow is a decision controller that determines the next step to execute based on the result of the previous step.

div.p: A Step is a single phase of a job. It defines the actual work to be done, including partitioning, reading, processing, and writing data.

p.span: Step could be Chunk that include Reader, Processor and Writer or Tasklet that is intended to execute some small scenario.

div.div: This is not partitioned or single chunk step.

switch.text: A Step is a single phase of a job. It defines the actual work to be d...
